issue.title: [CF 786] New condition to check: Client time/day of the week
issue.body:
Hi,

I occasionally lose track of time while playing and it would be cool if I could use the current day/time as conditions for condition icons.
It could also be used for things like alerting to not being valor capped on Tuesdays etc,

Thanks*G
